questions.getQuestion: SELECT questions.question questions.answer question_log.asked_at FROM question_log INNER JOIN questions ON question_log.question_id = questions.id WHERE question_log.id = $1 LIMIT 1
questions.getLatestQuestion: SELECT questions.question questions.answer question_log.asked_at FROM question_log INNER JOIN questions ON question_log.question_id = questions.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
